title: 85/26/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 December 1984 approving a specific programme for seeds in Greece pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 December 1984
approving a specific programme for seeds in Greece pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(85/26/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The specific programme communicated by the Greek Government on 2 May 1984 for seeds, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 December 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 180, 7. 7. 1984, p. 1.
